# PawsRise
# NOTE: THIS IS LINUX ONLY.

A simple python script to connect to Riseup VPN Services
(i suck at making README's)
# How to install:
First. You need OpenVPN. This is simple. 
# Fedora

sudo dnf update -y

sudo dnf install -y openvpn

# Ubuntu/Debian
sudo apt update

sudo apt install openvpn

# Arch
sudo pacman -Syu

sudo pacman -S openvpn

# Notes
Sometimes. OpenVPN requires you to enable services to make it start and enable it. Just simply [google it](https://www.google.com/search?q=how+to+start+OpenVPN+service+in+linux&client=ubuntu-sn&hs=xcb&sca_esv=882d27ba7320b5a9&channel=fs&sxsrf=AHTn8zr6T7JEr_MMi6sLUykqEGeBDkRhbQ%3A1745799571928&ei=k8kOaOe1OMvN0PEPsJvBEA&ved=0ahUKEwiny9WauvmMAxXLJjQIHbBNEAIQ4dUDCBA&uact=5&oq=how+to+start+OpenVPN+service+in+linux&gs__PzArIHBjIuNDAuMbgHuCo&sclient=gws-wiz-serp)

Now just run PawsRise.py and itll download all the stuff for you. You will select a server and itll connect to it.
